about_the_game:
James is sharp, adept, and not afraid to take chances - at least in his professional life. His personal life, by contrast, is nothing to write home about. It goes back 10 years to a formative experience that he's never quite recovered from. Sometimes your friends can be your worst enemies...at least that's what James took away from that jarring event.

So he poured himself into his work and did what he does best, soaring to stratospheric heights in his 9-to-5 at a local software company. He excels, but cannot shake the nagging thought that there is something missing from his life. He's a loner, and any friends he has these days are either at work, or of the online variety.

But that's about to change. A chance encounter while attending a work function sends James down a dizzying new path he'd never thought possible. It all comes to a head when James embarks on his own, personal City Park Play Date.

City Park Play Date is an Adult Visual Novel (AVN) in the form of a kinetic (linear) short story. Follow James through his remarkable change in fortune and help him to discard the notion once and for all that no normal woman would ever be interested in him.

We currently offer this title in the following languages by way of machine translations:

  • US English (native language)
  • Simplified Chinese
  • French
  • Japanese
  • Polish
  • Portuguese - Brazil
  • Portuguese - Portugal
  • Russian
  • Spanish
  • Swedish

NOTE: All languages other than US English are a work in progress, and not yet considered final. If you discover issues in the language you select and would like to help improve our translations, please visit our Discord and let us know.

content_descriptors.notes:
[i]City Park Play Date[/i] includes explicit sex acts & language. All characters in the game are 18+ and all sexual acts in the game are consensual. You must be 18 years or older to play.

[i]City Park Play Date[/i] includes: both male & female nudity, adult breastfeeding, big breasts, cuddling, cum shots, fingering, fondling, hand job, kissing, lactation, milking, oral sex, teasing, vaginal sex, & virgin sex. The player's only choice is how explicit the sex scenes are. This is set at the beginning of the story, but can be changed at any point via the preferences screen.

detailed_description:
James is sharp, adept, and not afraid to take chances - at least in his professional life. His personal life, by contrast, is nothing to write home about. It goes back 10 years to a formative experience that he's never quite recovered from. Sometimes your friends can be your worst enemies...at least that's what James took away from that jarring event.

So he poured himself into his work and did what he does best, soaring to stratospheric heights in his 9-to-5 at a local software company. He excels, but cannot shake the nagging thought that there is something missing from his life. He's a loner, and any friends he has these days are either at work, or of the online variety.

But that's about to change. A chance encounter while attending a work function sends James down a dizzying new path he'd never thought possible. It all comes to a head when James embarks on his own, personal City Park Play Date.

City Park Play Date is an Adult Visual Novel (AVN) in the form of a kinetic (linear) short story. Follow James through his remarkable change in fortune and help him to discard the notion once and for all that no normal woman would ever be interested in him.

legal_notice:
The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this production are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred.

All assets included in this product were either created by Doc62 Productions or purchased from reputable sources. Some free assets are included, as well, with attribution to those creators included on the "About" page accessible from the main menu.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: City Park Play Date is a kinetic (linear) short story. It is a true AVN, but linear by design, telling a very specific story. You play as James, the protagonist of our story. James is lucky in life, but not in love. Our story explains how that changes for him and opens his eyes to what is possible.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish
